newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - M.A. Hanna estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - M.A. Hanna estimate cut.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities said Wednesday it reduced its 1996 earnings estimate for M.A. Hanna Co to $1.25 a share from $1.27.

-- "The reduction reflects weakness in the company's rubber compounding business as the company acts as an independent compounder to customers that have in-house capacity and also softness in the business machines business, which we expect to persist in (the fourth quarter)," EVEREN said.

-- "The stock seems reasonably valued near term, but long term we believe the company has one of the better strategic plans that we have seen and should be capable of growing at a 13-15 (percent) rate for the next five years," EVEREN said.
-- The six-month target is $22 a share and the 18-month target is $27.
-- Shares of M.A. Hanna, a specialty chemicals company, rose 3/8 at 22-7/8.
